### About Sykdomspulsen

For more information about the Sykdomspulsen project you are welcome to read the official document here. 

[Norwegian version](https://www.fhi.no/hn/statistikk/sykdomspulsen/), [English version](https://www.fhi.no/en/hn/statistics/NorSySS/)

If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact the team at sykdomspulsen@fhi.no.




### About R related topics

For more information about our R packages, splverse and our infrastructure, you can either open a pull request in the GitHub repositories, or send us an email. 

You can find some of us on Twitter.
